Categories

MyBB is a free and open source, easy to use, PHP powered forum software. MyBB is multilingual, extremely customizable, and is constantly being developed.

  • MyBB License Agreement - Read MyBB's license, the GNU GPL v3

  • Requirements - Find out MyBB's requirements
  • Installing MyBB - Read the MyBB Installation Guide
  • Upgrading MyBB - Read the MyBB Upgrading Guide
  • MyBB Team - See the team of volunteers who make MyBB possible
  • MyBB general support portal - The first place to start if you need help with your MyBB forum
